com.github.luka5w.fileserver.api

Class API

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.luka5w.fileserver.api.API

  • public class API
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all API versions (aka HttpContexts which contain the endpoints.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      API(int ratelimit, int ratelimitVanishTime, java.lang.String cors, java.lang.String serverName)
      Creates a new API for an HttpServer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • API

        public API(int ratelimit,
           int ratelimitVanishTime,
           java.lang.String cors,
           java.lang.String serverName)
        Creates a new API for an HttpServer.
        Parameters:
        ratelimit - The maximal amount of requests per {rateLimitVanishTime}, a client can perform before getting 429 http status responses (RFC 6585: Too Many Requests).
        ratelimitVanishTime - The time, a request takes to "vanish" and reduces the amount of requests in this time.
        cors - When this argument is not empty (""), The 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header will be passed on response with the parameter as value.
        serverName - The name of the server, (probably - depending on API version) passed in the response headers.
        Since:
        1.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • getVersions

        public java.util.List<APIVersion> getVersions()
        Returns all API versions.
        Returns:
        The API versions.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • info

        public void info(com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpExchange httpExchange)
        The endpoint (aka HttpContexts to inform the client about the supported API versions.
        Parameters:
        httpExchange - The HttpExchange supplied by the HttpServer.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getLogger

        protected static com.github.luka5w.util.cli.Logger getLogger(java.lang.String version)
        Returns a logger for the versions.
        Parameters:
        version - The version, the logger should initiated for.
        Returns:
        The logger for the passed version
        Since:
        1.0.0
